divs: sighting detailssame thing as my pst from last night except the three lights forming the triangle just dissapeared after about an hour. i took some more pictures i dont exactly no what im looking at because this is not what i was seeing where the green spheres are there were small star like things that were moving about every 5 minuts it was very very noticable and im sure they moved. i dont no how many of them were actually ufo's because it looked like there were other stars like 20 of them thats all i could see i noticed at least 2 of them move(not the ones forming a triangle\upside down pyramid i did not see those move though they did change position in a half hours time, a drastic change of position then when i checked back after like 20 minuts it was gone) the ones i saw move and a phew others seem to be pulsating.
